data.title: Altron Nexus
data.text:
Altron Security uses a combination of advanced technology and intelligent solutions, technical expertise and strategic partners to ensure we offer the security controls needed to achieve todays most important business hurdle. Our identity and Digital security solutions are designed to deliver Confidence and Confidentiality with the best Customer Experience.

Through Altron 2.0, we aim to triple operating income, maintain a net debt to Ebitda of less than 1 and become a responsible environmental, social, and corporate governance company.

After successfully implementing the One Altron strategy, Altron is now looking to the future, with its Altron 2.0 initiative. This builds on, and further develops gains made through One Altron.

expanding our security offering and building on the solid performance of our recent acquisitions; deepening our relationships with Microsoft and Amazon Web Services to capture opportunities in the fast-growing Cloud Computing space; scaling up our own, high margin, IP platforms in HealthTech and Fintech as well as vehicle telematics in Netstar; and growing our Custom Application Development capabilities.

At Altron, our employees are at the centre of everything we do. As a values-based organisation delivering innovation that matters to our clients and communities, our employees are provided an opportunity to be part of our team where innovation, empowerment and providing differentiated technology solutions is the type of we work together to deliver.
